text_block_list.name: Interviewer
text_block_list.text:
I heard from your father! Duramente-san, that 
your goal is victory at one of the world's most 
prestigious races, the 『Prix de l'Arc de Triomphe』.

text_block_list.name: Interviewer
text_block_list.text:
Japan's long-awaited first victory……if that were to happen, 
then even people around the world would be impressed!

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text: …………That is not my role.

text_block_list.name: Interviewer
text_block_list.text: Ehh?

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text:
To surprise everyone with a victory, is the 
role of an "Underdog". What I desire is——

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text: ——To be crowned the "Strongest".

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: ——『Now the strongest has arrived!!』

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text:
……The strongest is not someone who should 
just be surprising. They should be overwhelming.

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text: As someone with this blood, I should be as well.

In every one of Duramente's interviews, 
the same phrases kept coming up.

That was just how important what resided within her 
body was to her. No, not just what resides within her——

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text:
Now, it begins. Autumn Selection Race! 
The Uma Musume make their way to the gate!

The 『Selection Race』 venue was filled with active Uma Musume, 
each hoping to be scouted. However, the most notable were——

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text:
…………——I'll show them. 
Prove it. From now on……I will——……

It was on a different level compared to the parallel 
running from before. Today, she was probably——"Serious".

text_block_list.name: Trainer With Knit Cap
text_block_list.text:
……! Hahaa……she's pretty wild. 
You can feel the tension in the air.

text_block_list.name: Trainer Wearing Red Lipstick
text_block_list.text:
Aah, how wonderful……! 
When this is over, I'll be the first to scout you……!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: Now the Uma Musume enter their gates. And——

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: It starts……what's this, Duramente!?

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: She's late to exit! She starts the race from behind!

text_block_list.name: Trainer With Knit Cap
text_block_list.text: Geh!? A late start!?

text_block_list.name: Trainer Wearing Red Lipstick
text_block_list.text:
But a handicap like this is nothing……! 
If she's able to use her abilities to the fullest then——

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text:
Haa……haa……haa! ……Haa……haa……haaa…… 
——Gaaaaaaaaaaaa!!

text_block_list.name: Stylish Trainer
text_block_list.text:
From the outside in an instant……! 
What explosive power, like this she should be able to——

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text:
But the leader refuses to yield! She runs! 
Pulling away! Just like that, first place is——

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: Goaaaaaaaal!!

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text:
……Haaa……haa……haa…… 
Damnit……

text_block_list.name: Trainer Wearing Red Lipstick
text_block_list.text:
Duramente! You were so close, huh!? 
But, please join my team——!

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text:
……I'm grateful. 
But, with a result like this, I can't accept it.

text_block_list.name: Stylish Trainer
text_block_list.text:
…………She's quite harsh on herself it seems. But on the other hand, 
it seems like she doesn't have a handle on her pride and spirit.

text_block_list.name: Trainer Wearing Red Lipstick
text_block_list.text:
But that's good! The fighting spirit can easily 
be managed! This time she stumbled, but with more 
experience, things should come naturally……!

text_block_list.name: Trainer With Knit Cap
text_block_list.text:
No, that wasn't the only reason she lost. There 
were rumors about her ankles, right? Truth is, 
she can't really put much strain on her feet.

——She was already well aware of her condition. 
She was also perfectly able to manage her own running already.

Her spirit too. Even when racing against an Upperclassman 
Uma Musume, she was able to flawlessly turn it in to strength.

text_block_list.name: Dura's Father
text_block_list.text: I was waiting for you, Dura.

text_block_list.name: Dura's Father
text_block_list.text:
How was the Selection Race? Did someone become your trainer? 
Even in victory, there is much to review until your debut——

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text:
……I placed 2nd in the Selection Race. 
Due to that, I plan to register for the next Selection Race.

text_block_list.name: Dura's Father
text_block_list.text:
……! …………I see. 
Then I suppose training is the priority for now.

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text:
Even though you made time for me, I only have 
something like this to report. For that, I apologize.

text_block_list.name: Dura's Father
text_block_list.text:
You don't need to apologize. Though, it might be 
better not to attend next week's dance party. The 
unnecessary stress might hinder your progress.

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text:
……! No, I'll attend. Now that I've begun working 
towards my career, an absence would be out of the question.

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text:
At the party I'll be able to introduce myself to many 
influential people, including those affiliated with the 
URA. It's something my mother and others have done.

text_block_list.name: Dura's Father
text_block_list.text:
……Well, I suppose the event is somewhat like a 
debutante ball. And particularly the dance, where most 
girls from prominent families make their appearance.

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text:
Yes. That dance is a declaration that the new generation will lead 
from here. ……In that case, I should be the one to stand there.

text_block_list.name: Dura's Father
text_block_list.text:
………… Understood. 
However, don't forget what it is that you hope to achieve.

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text: ……Yes.

text_block_list.name: Dura's Father
text_block_list.text:
……Oh, I'm sorry. That's all the time I have for today. 
Give my regards to your escort from the other day. Until next time.

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text: Yes. I'll be praying for father's success as well……——

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text: (……!! From the other day……my escort……!?)
